ELEKTRA.MX.summary: Grupo Elektra, S.A.B. de C.V. operates as a financial services and specialty retailing company in Latin America, as well as a short-term non-bank loan provider in the United States. The company's Retail Business segment engages in the sale of motorcycles, cell phones, small household and major appliances, electronics, furniture, car batteries, computers, mattresses, entertainment systems, fashion goods and accessories, beauty and personal care products, and sporting goods, as well as films, music, and books. It is also involved in the provision of wire transfers, extended guarantees, airtime, mobile virtual network operation, and long distance services, as well as in the e-commerce activities. Its Financial Business segment provides banking and financial products and services comprising consumer credit, personal loans, commercial loans, savings and investment accounts, term deposits, debit cards, credit cards, life and casualty insurance, medical and liability insurance, retirement fund management options, credit information, lease-financing services, group and secured loans, and short-term non-bank loans. The company operates approximately 7,000 points of contact in Mexico, the United States, Guatemala, Honduras, Panama, and Peru. Grupo Elektra, S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Mexico City, Mexico.

GFMULTIO.MX.long_name: Grupo Financiero Multiva, S.A.B. de C.V.
GFMULTIO.MX.summary: Grupo Financiero Multiva, S.A.B. de C.V. provides various personal and business banking products and services in Mexico. It offers checking accounts, referred deposits, credit products, SME credits, and various cards; and Internet banking, payments, payroll, trust, investment, stock trustee, investment banking, corporate financing, and investment fund services, as well as car and other insurance products. The company is based in Mexico City, Mexico. Grupo Financiero Multiva, S.A.B. de C.V. is a subsidiary of Grupo Empresarial Ãngeles, S.A. de C.V.
